content: --अभवन्मतयोगः, --संयोगः (in <ab>Rhet.</ab>) a defect in composition; अभवन् असंभवन्नपि मतः इष्टः योगः संबंधः यत्र <ls>K. P. 7</ls>; the ‘failure of an intended connection’, or want of harmony between the ideas to be expressed and the words expressing them; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} ईक्षसे यत्कटाक्षेण तदा धन्वी मनोभवः, here the word यत् can have no {%correlation%} with तदा though intended by the poet. The proper reading would be ईक्षसे चेत् &c.; for other examples see <ls>S. D. 575</ls> {%ad loc.%}
